wikipedia_page.main: Roger Brian Blackmore (born 1941) is a Liberal Democrat politician.  He was  leader of Leicester City Council from 2003 to 2004 and 2005 to 2007 and Lord Mayor of Leicester  2009/10.

response: After a long period of Labour administration (since 1979), the city council from May 2003 was run by a Liberal Democrat/Conservative coalition under Roger Blackmore, which collapsed in November 2004. The minority Labour group ran the city until May 2005, under Ross Willmott, when the Liberal Democrats and Conservatives formed a new coalition, again under the leadership of Roger Blackmore.
* Roger Blackmore (born 1941), politician and Lord Mayor of Leicester
